publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1238.1 Murdo Fraser: Importance of Scottish History in the School Curriculumâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1238) in the name of Maureen Watt, insert at end "however, emphasises that it is important that Scottish history is taught in a balanced manner, which encourages young people to evaluate the evidence critically and come to their own conclusions, and that it is taught in its rightful context, namely alongside local, British, European and world history, and further emphasises that courses must be of a high quality with teachers being supported by new teaching resources and continuing professional development training as necessary."
